name: Sachertorte
description: A dense chocolate cake with a layer of apricot jam and chocolate icing.

name: Apfelstrudel
description: A thin dough filled with apples, cinnamon, sugar, and often raisins.

name: Kaiserschmarrn
description: A fluffy, shredded pancake, served with powdered sugar and apple sauce or plum compote.

name: Topfenstrudel
description: A strudel filled with a sweet curd cheese (quark) mixture, often with raisins.

name: Marillenknödel
description: Small dumplings filled with apricots, encased in a dough made from curd cheese, semolina, or potatoes.

name: Linzer Torte
description: A crumbly tart with a layer of red fruit jelly, typically currant, and a lattice of dough on top.

name: Mohnnudeln
description: Potato noodles generously sprinkled with ground poppy seeds and sugar.

name: Salzburger Nockerln
description: A sweet soufflé often dusted with powdered sugar and served with a fruit sauce.

name: Palatschinken
description: Thin pancakes, similar to French crêpes, filled with various sweet fillings like jam, curd cheese, or chocolate.

name: Eispalatschinken
beschreibung: Thin pancakes filled with ice cream and often topped with fruit sauce or chocolate syrup.

name: Buchteln
description: Baked yeast dough buns, filled with jam, often served in a vanilla sauce.
